I bought this necklace and got lots of compliments.  Then, after just 2 months the string broke when I was out on a date and sent beads crashing to the floor.  I was so embarrassed.  Stupid me thought maybe I must’ve snagged it somehow because how could a string just break in the middle on its own.  Believing the odds of it happening again were impossible, I ordered another necklace.  You guessed it, just 2 months later I was sitting in a chair, not even touching the thing and the string broke right in the middle again, dumping beads everywhere.  As cool as this necklace looks, it’s guaranteed to leave you looking like a fool in public when it just falls off your neck for no reason.  Save your money.  This product is absolute trash.
